issue.title: [CI] Disable code coverage on Travis-CI
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7067](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7067). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Computing and uploading code coverage data probably makes Travis-CI builds even slower. Since the resulting data isn't currently exploited (and furthermore partial builds can upload bogus data, e.g. showing some C++ uncovered if only R is rebuilt), we should just disable it.
